Class MainViewController

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MainViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Control the data flow and the behavior of the main view of the GUI.

    • Method Detail

      • onSubmitConsumerClicked

        public void onSubmitConsumerClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Handle event when user click the submit consumer button. In particular, when the user click on the submit consumer button after inputing all the required fields, the main view switch into the ConsumersView. A range of consumers is generated based on the input numbers and is shown in the ConsumersView. If the user does not input all the required fields, a message that reminds the user to do so is pop-up.
        Parameters:
        event - click the submit consumer button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onSubmitGeneratorClicked

        public void onSubmitGeneratorClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Handle event when user click the submit generator button. In particular, when the user click on the submit generator button after inputing all the required fields, the main view switch into the GeneratorsView. A range of generators is generated based on the input numbers and is shown in the GeneratorsView. If the user does not input all the required fields, a message that reminds the user to do so is pop-up.
        Parameters:
        event - click the submit generator button
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onResultButtonClicked

        public void onResultButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Handle event when user click the result button. In particular, when the user click on the result button, the StatisticsView is pop-up to show the simulation of the PowerGrid. If the user does not initialize either the consumers or the generators, a message that reminds the user to do so is pop-up.
        Parameters:
        event - click the result button
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Initialize the control object that controls all the data flow in the system.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
